Improvements.Description: The HashMap `factories` is being initialized but not used before being reassigned a new value. This is redundant and can be removed.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract common code into separate method
Improvements.Description: The code to handle `executors` and `reactiveExecutors` is almost identical. This common code can be extracted into a separate method to avoid duplication. This will make the code shorter, easier to read, and easier to maintain.
